channel.title: CardFunc Developer Documentation on CardFunc
channel.description: Recent content in CardFunc Developer Documentation on CardFunc

item.title: General
item.description: This details the general usage of the CardFunc API.

item.title: List authorizations
item.description: The List endpoint is used to list previously created authorizations.

item.title: Capture
item.description: The capture endpoint is used for performing capture, using an authorization.

item.title: Cancel
item.description: The Cancel endpoint is used to cancel the authorization to withdraw a reserved amount. If capture has already been performed on the authorization, cancelling the authorization will not refund the amount. For that, the refund endpoint should be used.

item.title: Refund authorization
item.description: The refund endpoint is used for refunding an amount that has already been captured, using an authorization.

item.title: Data type reference
item.description: The Reference section describes data types used in requests to and responses from the CardFunc API.
